ComicInfo.Summary:
Edwyn is rattled and on his heels with his world turned upside-down—and that’s bad news for the men holding the love of his life hostage. Heads are about to roll, literally, and the blood is going to flow.
And God help Virginia’s kidnappers if she ends up with a leak.
